section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
goals__remit:
Human Ecosystems Relazioni is a research and service center which transforms buildings, cities and territories in data generators using social networks, sensors, ubiquitous interactive systems, to study relational ecosystems, information, communication and knowledge flows, to enable citizens, professionals, organizations and institutions to design and build strategies, actions and participated initiatives. 
Human Ecosystems Relazioni uses advanced technologies, design and the arts to unite innovation and social and cultural impact.
